about_the_game:
FIVE FANTASTIC SLOPES
Battle against your friends as you race down the mountain slopes in this multiplayer battle-racing brawler!


TONS OF FUN ABILITIES
Shoot, fly, and zoom your way to the finish line.


FUN WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILIY
Play Online, through LAN, or try to beat the computers solo.


HOW-TO MULTIPLAYER
Hosting a public game allows anyone up to 4 players (total) to join you (password optional). Private matches require a Steam invite or a Steam-Friends request to Join. Alternatively, you may connect via LAN (Local-Area-Network) for quick and easy connection within your household (Offline).

To invite a friend to a private match, press [shift+tab] while in game, select the Friends tab, right click a friend and press Invite to Game. Note, accepting an invite while the game is not running will only launch the game. The game must be up and running while accepting an invite to join the match.

CONTROLLER SUPPORT
Should work with just about any controller. You may want to leave steam input for controllers disabled for best control mapping.

LYLEK GAMES
Solo developer creating games that bring back that ol' homey, classic feel. Primarily focused on family-friendly, small group multiplayer games.

name: Elfboarders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5200 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7200 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Elfboarders, a competitive snowboard-racing, beat-em-ups brawler! Relative to the games of the 90s, Elfboarders brings a focus on LAN, multiplayer play, and a try-to-beat-the-computers-solo attitude. Four player maximum. Online play available.
